original_title: 深夜の高速バス車内で退屈しのぎに、エロDVDやエロ本を見ていたら、隣の座席の女の子がガン見してきて、なんかエッチな雰囲気になった！
overview: I have to see it... but I want to see it. The girl in the seat next to me who is glancing at me when I'm watching erotic DVDs and erotic books in the seat next to me on a highway bus. She may have been stimulated by her crotch with the erotic video that was suddenly shown, and she shamelessly hit her excitement in the late-night bus when everyone was asleep! Excitement of going out + late-night erotic video ignites in erotic mode!
title: I Was Watching Porn to Kill Time on the Night Bus, and It Really Turned on the Girl Sitting Next to Me!
